content: Twerk your way to a merry Christmas with a tree filled with dozens of Miley Cyrus wrecking ball ornaments. With this festive DIY kit, you’ll be able to cut out mini Miley Cyrus’s to hang atop each ball ornament – transforming them into wrecking balls.

Upstage the entire neighborhood’s holiday decorations with the giant inflatable Christmas tree on the front yard.  The this colorful tree stands over 10 feet tall and inflates automatically so you can begin spreading Christmas joy as soon as you plug it in.

As the Negativity Scene demonstrates, the first Christmas was not a happy event. Mary never got the epidural she requested, John  kept having to deal with the curious goat, and the three wise men had to walk so much they didn’t even make it on time for the birth.

Create some geek-tastic drinks when you prepare them using the critical hit d20 ice mold. The critical hit ice mold is made from dishwasher and oven safe silicone which means it can be utilized to make tasty baked goods in addition to some kick-ass ice cubes.

Give your cocktails some spine tingling appeal with the dry ice drinks machine. The drinks machine lets your unleash your inner bartender and create wild and tasty concoctions so good they’ll have every guest at the party begging for more.

After all the mind-numbing reality TV, there’s no better way to exercise your brain muscles than with the laser maze game. The goal of this challenging and entertaining game is to hit every token with a laser by strategically moving the mirrors around on the board.

Keep the realm of officedesktopland protected with the Skyrim Dragonborn statue. This hyper realistic 1/6th scale figure is hand painted with hand-tailored fabrics. Standing at an impressive 16″ in height, this Dragonborn warrior will protect you mini office dragons.

Create a delicious and long lasting impression on potential clients with these real beef jerky business cards. These protein packed business cards are custom designed to fit your specific business and come printed on delicious, all-American, cholesterol riddled beef jerky.

Brighten up your morning shaving routine with the neon shaving gel. Available in a variety of vibrant colors, this colorful shaving gel is perfect for the modern man who has grown weary of the typical grooming sessions and wants to liven things up.

titleEN: Star Wars Light Up Lawn Ornaments
content: Illuminate your front yard this holiday season with the true saviors of this galaxy, the Star Wars light up lawn ornaments. These festive ornaments display light up versions of all your favorite Star Wars characters – each dressed in their own festive Christmas gear.

Stop getting dehydrated while your rave your wild little techno heart out – with the light up drinking water bottle you’ll be able to stay hydrated while still enjoying a mind-blowing night club experience. Reality altering drugs sold separately.

Cruise around town like the 1990’s caped crusader with the Batman Returns Batmobile. This eye catching replica places you behind the wheel of one of the most recognizable Batmobiles of all time and guarantees to get you noticed on the road.

Conquer the outdoors this winter with the retractable spikes snow boots. These tough-as-nails snow boots feature retractable spikes built right into the sole, so you can transition seamlessly when travelling through changing terrains.

Get blasphemous this holiday season with the Christmas themed yamaka. Whether you’re a Christian or a Jew, you’ll be sure to rattle some cages at the family gathering this year while wearing this comfy and fashionable one size fits all headcap.

With the octopus backpack firmly tentacled onto your back you’ll never feel lonely. This underwater creature loves to just hang around all day while allowing you to store all your gear in its spacious and hollow body – making him a great buddy to have while running errands.

The electric tank wheelchair is the go-to vehicle for the handicap-able adventurer looking to conquer the elements. This specially made wheelchair features a tank-like wheel system to help you trek across whatever rugged environment mother nature throws your way.

Turn your hands into fashionable technology with the circuit board fingernails. These stick on fingernails are easy to apply and feature a printed circuit board design that’ll place you at the forefront of fashion.  And their intricate and crazy design matches any kind of look.

Prepare to get more ass than a toilet seat when you start rocking the great Kenny Powers’s mullet baseball cap. This life changing hat will give you the irresistible look of a drugged out former MLB superstar who can still throw faster than fuck.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Ice Cream
content: Enjoy ice cream on a whole new level with a scoop of the glow in the dark ice cream. This luminous brand of ice cream is specially made to entice more than just your taste buds. It emits a fun radioactive glow that’s completely safe to eat and even more fun to look at.

Protect Gotham from evildoers and still make it in time to play a game of 9-holes with the Batman Tumblr golf cart. This custom built armored Wayne Enterprises vehicle is the ultimate way to golf in true billionaire crime fighter style.

Get ready to space out at work like never before with the kinetic light cradle. One glance and you’ll be completely smitten in the hypnotizing back and forth motion of the light up balls. The workday will fly by without you even noticing and you’ll be fired in no time.

When you find yourself between a rock and a horde of hungry corpses, the zombie apocalypse survival Jeep is your only ticket out. With this fully loaded and specially equipped Jeep by your side, you’ll significantly increase your chances of getting to see another day.

Use the Iron Man arc reactor coasters to guard your wooden furniture from water rings in true Tony Stark fashion. These officially licensed coasters are sleek, double as a light source, and are made with the same quality as the Iron Man’s high-tech suit.

The tactical holiday stocking is a great way of showing the military man or woman in your life you’re thinking about them during the holidays. Complete with MOLLE straps, carabiners, and quick release clips, it’s truly the tactical approach to the holiday gift giving.

Create the most delectable treats in the galaxy with the Star Wars Darth Vader mold. The mold lets any Stars Wars fan create sweet looking and tasting snacks that everyone will love to munch on – even if they’re apart of the Rebel scum alliance.

There’s no limit to the terrains you’ll be able to explore with the airless tires ATV. This rugged one of a kind ATV is built for the rocky outdoors, as it features custom non-pneumatic tires that provide a smooth ride that won’t go flat like regular tires.

The Aliens Facehugger egg is the ultimate toy – it doubles as a collectible and pranking accessory. The egg is meticulously decorated to resemble the prop from the movie. It even features a green button that you push to unleash an adorable tiny Facehugger.

Now you can own irrefutable proof of our lord and savior with the 3D printed miracle Jesus potato chip. This life changing potato chip is not edible – but then again what kind of heathen would want to eat Christ like he was some kind of cracker you just eat every Sunday?

Go retro with your iPhone using the NES controller case. Featuring real press-able buttons, this protective case adds nostalgia to your iPhone, and if you press Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A, Start you get unlimited data on your phone plan.

Wield arcane magic with help from the Technomancer digital wizard hoodie. Whether you’re into casting fireballs, shockwaves, restoring health, or even raising the dead – this magical garment will bestow you with powers you only previously dreamed of.

Transform yourself into your favorite cyclops with the Futurama themed Leela hat. This custom made woven beanie warms your noggin when the weather gets cold while disguising your forehead to look like Leela’s with a cyclops eye and purple hair.

Stay warm and enjoy the lovely winter scenery while in the wood burning hot tub. The hot tub employs a simple yet effective system that utilizes wood and natural circulation to heat up the water inside – it’s rustic elegance at its best.

Help your newborn warrior unleash their inner power with the Power Rangers onesies. With all six colors at your disposal, you’ll be able to dress up your newborn like any of your favorite Power Rangers – it’s geeky and nostalgic apparel at its best.

There’s nothing better than Scotchy Scotch Scotch – except maybe Scotch flavored ice cream. This sweet and delicious treat and won’t ever give you a nasty hangover. We don’t know how to put this – but  the Scotch flavored ice cream is kind of a big deal.

Channel your inner Imperial and redecorate your home with these Death Star wall tiles. The tiles come expertly decorated to resemble the exterior of the Death Star and help create the illusion your home is part of planet destroying space station.

Channel Tony Stark’s attitude, charisma, and contagious charm every time you wear the Iron Man hoodie. Designed to resemble Iron Man’s famous suit, the hoodie’s graphics sprawl throughout the entire garment – it’s comfort and style at its best.

Reminisce over  the humble beginnings of Walt and Jesse’s burgeoning empire with the Breaking Bad meth snow globe. The snow globe depicts Walt and Jesse’s first lab in the middle of the Albuquerque desert – shake it up and a cloud of blue meth engulfs the RV.

Be the center of attention at the slopes this winter when you wear the light up snow boots. Featuring an eye-catching illuminated Nike swoosh design, these snow boots are also made with customizable flex and lunarlon cushioning to offer a soft yet responsive ride.

The Iron Man arc reactor ring is the accessory no Marvel fan’s killer outfit should be without. Inspired by the Iron Man’s arc reactor, this unique ring features a metal alloy construction and is topped off with an enameled metallic finish in traditional Iron Man colors.

This holiday season greet your guests in style with the giant inflatable snowman on the front yard. This massive snowman sprawls out over an area 20 feet long as he lays on his side with a smile so cheerful it will brighten up anyone’s day.

Introducing the disco ball gnome – part festive garden ornament, part epic party mascot, and all around awesome. This gnome is decorated in true disco style and is always ready to get down. It’s the ultimate piece to liven up any garden or patio area.

Keep the room looking clean and organized with the secret storage lifting bed. The mattress of this unique bed lifts up to reveal a spacious and concealed compartment great for storing extra clothes or valuables you don’t want anyone else to get their hands on.

The 8-bit treasure chest will make it feel like you’re in a game every time you reach for a piece of jewelry. This little gem is designed to look just like a treasure chest straight out of a classic game and plays a delightfully nostalgic melody every time it’s opened.

With the grass printer lawn mower, you’re not simply doing chores, you’re creating customized landscapes. This unique mower allows your creativity to run wild by creating fun patterns and styles such as obscene curse words and absurdly phallic drawings.

Holy moly raviolli! With the ultra realistic action figures you’ll be able to own the 1960’s most dynamic crime fighting duo – Batman and Robin. Each action figure is crafted with superb craftsmanship to capture all the corny greatness of this iconic team.

Dress up your tiny Doctor in training with the time lord onesie. This adorable handmade onesie features a vintage outfit, complete with brown turncoat and burgundy bowtie to have your little bundle of joy looking as spiffy as the Doctor himself.

The twerking Miley Einstein is the complete package – beauty and brains. This hilarious figurine mashes up one of the greatest minds in history with one of the most “talented entertainers” of our easily amused generation, Miley Cyrus.

Put the finishing touches on your geeky tree with a few Doctor Who Christmas ornaments. These miniature ornaments are extremely detailed glass sculptures resembling the famous TARDIS and the evil Daleks. No Whovian Christmas would be complete without them.

One look at the adorable Aliens Xenomorph plushie and you’ll forget why you ever feared them in the first place. These cuddly Aliens are officially licensed, extremely huggable, and shoot highly acidic liquid out his fearsome teeth whenever you press its belly.

The Nintendo controller backpack is the ultimate game and console carrying bag. You can take this onto campus so that all those who appreciated a good round on the NES will be insanely jealous and know that you are truly an icon of nostalgic style.

Stock up on red crayons and get ready to bring the land of Westeros to life with the Game Of Thrones coloring book. This exciting book features realistically drawn characters from the hit TV show, as well as extremely detailed house sigils to color in.

Stay warm as you suit up with the Voltron hoodie and save the universe from the forces of evil. This eye catching multicolored hoodie is one high quality piece of apparel – it features 3D accents and a foam lined hoodie with detachable jaw piece that complete the look.

Bring a little nostalgia to your Christmas tree decorating this year with these retro controller tree ornaments. These festive ornaments are shaped just like controllers from all the classic gaming consoles we grew up on in the 80’s, 90’s and early 2000’s.

Who better than the grumpy cat mini statue to share your workweek woes with while at work. The statue stands a mighty 1.5 inches tall, making it ideal for any size workstation. His disapproving stare provides all the motivation you need to make it through the day.

Give your cramped home the illusion it’s bigger on the inside with the Doctor Who TARDIS rug. This officially licensed rug measures nearly 6 feet long and makes a great addition for any Whovian’s room, home or office and is available in two different designs.

Live life in the fast lane while at the helm of the incredibly fast Wazuma V8 quad bike. This supercharged quad bike is powered by 3.0L Ferrari V8 mated to a sequential gear box from a BMW M3 to produce a truly unforgettable, one of a kind type ride.

Turn any door in the home into an entrance for a time traveling spacecraft machine with the Doctor Who TARDIS door cling. This geeky decoration adds a touch of Whovian personality to the room and will fit virtually any door in your home.

Make the holidays a little more fabulous with the rainbow Christmas tree. This rare pine displays a swirling plethora of vibrant colors so fantastic you won’t need any other decorations. The tree exudes positive energy and can be used more than one time a year.

No Picasso, Rembrandt, or Degas can hold a candle when placed next to a framed Star Wars painting. These masterful paintings depict all of your favorite characters from the Star Wars saga in stunning detail. It’s the perfect gift for any geeky art aficionado.

Whether you’re drinking some coffee or delicious scotchy scotch scotch, there’s no better receptacle than the Anchorman Channel 4 mug. This classy mug sports the same logo as the Emmy award winning Channel 4 News team – second to none.

The Superman ice cubes will cool your drink so fast you’ll think Superman just used his freeze breathe on it. This silicone ice tray makes up to a dozen ice cubes – each shaped like Superman’s iconic symbol. A must have for anyone with kids or comic geeks in the house.

Add a fun accent to your kids bathroom with the goldfish window decals. These brightly colored decals turn the windows into a one of a kind aquarium you can shower alongside everyday.  They’re the ideal bath time companions.

The spilled paint lamps turns a potential disaster into an eye catching, functional work of art.  These stark white lamps are made from a sturdy iron plate frame and provide a clever and aesthetically pleasing light source for the room. It’s a stylish addition for any room.

Become a ruthless drug kingpin with a simple flip of the “Ask Me About Meth” shirt. The front sports a logo encouraging onlookers to ask you about meth – once they do, you can flip the shirt and transform into Heisenberg to complete the transaction.

What time is it? Hang on let me check my watc– OH YEAH, PARTY TIME! This novelty temporary tattoo displays a vibrant and colorful digital watch that’s always set to the best time of the day – party time. And if you party hard enough, you might wake up with a permanent version.

The Kung-Fu Panda lamp lets you control the lighting in your room with nothing more than your voice. This cute and disciplined pupil stands ready to hear his sensei’s commands – once you give the order its head illuminated to create lovely ambient lighting.

Shake things up a bit in the Who-niverse with the Doctor Who TARDIS snow globe. With just a few quick shakes you’ll get to watch some cheerful snow slowly fall over this officially licensed TARDIS encased in a globe with a “Doctor Who” labelled base.

The radioactive elements coasters do a lot more than prevent water rings from forming on furniture. These amusing coasters resemble radioactive elements as they appear on the periodic table and provide a nice soothing glow without causing any of that pesky radiation.

See if you’ve got what it takes to be a Maverick in the sky by completing the fighter pilot experience. You’ll take to the skies, pull G’s, and be on the lookout for bogeys trying to shoot you down. It’s the ultimate gift for those who feel the need – the need for speed!

The orbiting mechanical automatic watch is not your typical watch – the fully exposed, mechanical movement is the actual display. This timeless yet modern watch allows you to glimpse into the very heartbeat of the watch, and is a great gift for a timekeeping enthusiast.

Parade around town looking like a real somebody with these creepily realistic celebrity masks. Brought to you by the same disturbed artists who created the infamous baby masks, these celebrity masks showcase icons from all generations and genres of stardom.

Discourage any potential creeper or perverts you encounter on the streets with the hairy leg stockings. Once the guys lay eyes on your shapely and excessively hairy stems they won’t even bother giving you a second glance – unless they’re into that sort of thing.

When you’re sweating like a pig, nothing works harder at killing odor quite like the bacon powder deodorant. Made with bits of real bacon, this potent deodorant will have you smelling downright delicious – which may be a problem if cannibalism is common in your area.

Relive your glorious gaming days in a drunken and nostalgic haze with the Game Boy flask. This quality stainless steel flask holds 8 oz. of your favorite liquor and comes styled like the original Nintendo Game Boy – a real treat for alcoholics and gamers alike.

Forget about mom’s pumpkin pie, this holiday season it’s all about the turkey ice cream cake. This delicious treat adds the perfect finishing touch to any holiday feast. It’s custom made with two ice cream flavors and comes glazed with a delectable sweet sugary coating.

Hold the galaxy’s fate in your hands next time you engage in a thrilling game of Stars Wars trench toss. It’s the classic game of bean bag toss with an awesome Star Wars twist. Each toss gets you one step closer to destroying the Death Star and defeating the Empire.

Start off your day the right way by showering with the Marvel superhero soap. These custom crafted soaps are made from organic ingredients and are shaped like some of Marvel’s mightiest heroes. They’re made with attention to detail and even glow in the dark!

There’s no better fit for the cramped apartment of a bookworm than the hollowed out reading chair. The chair’s innovative design allows you to sit comfortably while the hollowed out body underneath houses your home library without taking up any extra space.

Look no further than the sports themed strawberries when in search of a romantic gift for your overly-macho man. They’re fresh, succulent, and come dressed in a fun and tasty sports themed coating he’ll love. There’s nothing he’ll love more – other than sex.

Make your soul sucking weekday morning a bit more magical with the plush unicorn slippers. These cuddly and whimsical morning slippers fits most adult sizes, are easy to clean, and make you feel like you’re walking on unicorn shaped clouds.

Nothing goes together better than handy work, power tools, and alcohol. This hammer replaces the standard claw with a more useful bottle opener. So you can reward yourself during or afterwards with a beer for all the hard work you’re accomplishing.

The adventure is guaranteed to go way past sunset when you’re on top of the light up paddleboard. Thanks to the high performance LED lights that illuminate up to 40 feet, you’ll be able to spot potential threats and navigate through dark waters with ease.

Harness the power of the ocean with the hydro powered jetovator and soar the skies like a majestic seagull. The jetovator utilizes 3 powerful jets of water to suspend you up to 25 feet above the water’s surface while you steer from a comfortable seated position.

Breakfast is no longer just the most important meal of the day, it is now also the most sinister thanks to the skull egg shaper. The shaper transforms your sunny side up eggs into a pale white skull – complete with two big and tasty yolk eyes.

Get scientific with your morning cup of joe with the caffeine molecule cup. This molecule shaped coffee mug holds 7 ounces and features a glazed ceramic finish that accurately depicts the caffeine molecule. It’s the fun and educational way to chug down your morning fuel.

Get nostalgic while you cuddle up with some of these downright menacing Doom inspired plushie one eyed monsters. With your choice of the Cacodemon or Pain Elemental, these geeky plushies will warm your heart while they also try to rip it out and eat it.

Come to the Dark Side – we have cookies! With its easily replenishable cookie-based power core, this fully armed and operational Star Wars Death Star themed cookie jar is perfect for preventing your munchies from going Chewie and is a must have for Star Wars fans.

Give the gift of diamonds and light up the face of a Minecraft fan with this touch activated light-up diamond ore block. With an average of 3.097 diamond ore per chunk sized area, these officially licensed Minecraft blocks are the ultimate gift for any gamer.

With the selfie picture remote you’ll be able to get the picture you always knew your profile deserved. With this handy remote you’ll be able to set your phone at the perfect angle to get the shot you want – just make your duckface and press the button. It’s that simple.

Turn your next culinary experience into a full on adventure when you dine at the Waterfall Restaurant. You and your family will get to enjoy a tasty lunch on the outdoor dining area set mere inches from pristine water falls. You’ll be immersed in nature the entire meal.

Type in IDDQD and unleash these limited edition DOOM mini action figures while you re-live your glory days from one of the most influential FPS games ever made. This collector’s set includes the cyberdemon, Arch-vile, Hell Knight, and many others.

Channel your inner Disco Stu as you single-handedly try to bring back the 1970s with the disco pants. Whether you plan to hit the club scene or are attending your little sister’s violin recital, these sequenced pants are without a doubt the pair to wear.

Turn your everyday bottle into a missile of mayhem with the bottle rocket launcher. Just load up, aim, and take fire at whatever small structure you wish to annihilate. There’s no limit to the amount of mischief you and a group of friends will be able to cause.

Explore the deep ocean without all of the complicated diving equipment with the snorkel hookah. This useful device takes snorkeling to new depths – it houses a floating oxygen reservoir that lets you swim freely about while diving at depths of 36 feet for up to an hour.

Brighten up your humble blocky abode with the Minecraft light-up torch. This geeky Minecraft inspired wall light illuminates with level 14 light,  preventing hostiles from spawning and giving your home or office an abundance of visibility during the night time.

Part toy, part weapon, and 100% badass – that’s the hunting slingshot. While the slingshot provides boat loads of fun, it can come in handy for many everyday situations. It features a high performance aluminum frame and quality components that will stand up to heavy use.

Soar to the highest peaks of Dagobah after one hit of the Yoda pipe, you will. The mighty Jedi master is back and ready to train you in the advanced and ancient practice of inhaling the force – a technique so effective the Empire outlawed it throughout the galaxy.

Even if your Rolex watch stops ticking, the sundial ring will keep you informed of the time. This handy little accessory allows you to employ the ancient practice of using the sun to tell what time of the day it is – just like our ancestors did.

With the beer filled USB drive, not even work or school will get in between you enjoying some good brew. The USB stores up to 4GB of information and features a one of a kind design made to resemble some refreshing Budweiser – complete with never evaporating suds.

When you were small the Muppets helped you to count, now as an adult the Muppets eyeglasses holder will help you keep track of your things. They’re hand made crocheted Muppet heads designed with big ears and noses so you can hang your glasses on them.
